flavorText: "We will defend the Worldsoul from Izzet 'progress' at any cost."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir werden die Weltenseele um jeden Preis gegen den ‚Fortschritt' der Izzet verteidigen."
foreignData.name: Militante Dryade
foreignData.text: Falls eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexereikarte von irgendwoher auf einen Friedhof gelegt würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: "Defenderemos el Alma del mundo del 'progreso' Ízzet a cualquier precio."
foreignData.name: Dríada militante
foreignData.text: Si una carta de instantáneo o de conjuro fuera a ser puesta en un cementerio desde cualquier parte, en vez de eso, exíliala.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous défendrons à tout prix l'Âme du monde contre les prétendus progrès des Izzet. »
foreignData.name: Militante dryade
foreignData.text: Si une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel devait être mise dans un cimetière d'où qu'elle vienne, exilez-la à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: "Difenderemo l'Anima del Mondo dal 'progresso' degli Izzet a ogni costo."
foreignData.name: Driade Militante
foreignData.text: Se una carta istantaneo o stregoneria sta per essere messa in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, invece esiliala.

foreignData.flavorText: 「私達はどんな犠牲を払おうともイゼットの"進歩"から世界魂を守り抜く。」
foreignData.name: ドライアドの闘士
foreignData.text: インスタント・カードかソーサリー・カードがいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれる場合、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドライアド・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "어떤 대가를 치르더라도 이젯의 '진보'로부터 세계의 영혼을 지킬 것이다."
foreignData.name: 호전적 드라이어드
foreignData.text: 순간마법 또는 집중마법 카드가 어디에서부터든 무덤에 들어가려고 하면, 대신에 그 카드를 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Vamos defender a Grande Anima do 'progresso' dos Izzet a qualquer custo."
foreignData.name: Militante Dríade
foreignData.text: Se um card de mágica instantânea ou feitiço seria colocado em um cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, em vez disso, exile-o.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мы защитим Всесознание от иззетского "прогресса" — любой ценой».
foreignData.name: Воинственная Дриада
foreignData.text: Если карта мгновенного заклинания или волшебства должна быть положена откуда-либо на кладбище, изгоните ее вместо этого.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们将不惜一切代价，保卫世界之魂免遭伊捷侵蚀。」
foreignData.name: 好斗树灵
foreignData.text: 如果任一瞬间或法术牌将从任何地方置入坟墓场，改为将它放逐。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我們將不計代價捍衛世界之魂，對抗來自伊捷的『進步』。」
foreignData.name: 好鬥樹靈
foreignData.text: 如果任一瞬間或巫術牌將從任何地方置入墳墓場，改為將它放逐。

name: Dryad Militant
originalText: If an instant or sorcery card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

rulings.text: If an instant or sorcery spell destroys Dryad Militant directly (like Murder does), that instant or sorcery card will be put into its owner’s graveyard. However, if an instant or sorcery card deals lethal damage to Dryad Militant, Dryad Militant will remain on the battlefield until the next time state-based actions are checked, which is after the instant or sorcery finishes resolving. The instant or sorcery will be exiled.

If an instant or sorcery card is discarded while Dryad Militant is on the battlefield, abilities that function when a card is discarded (such as madness) still work, even though that card never reaches a graveyard. In addition, spells or abilities that check the characteristics of a discarded card (such as Chandra Ablaze’s first ability) can find that card in exile.

text: If an instant or sorcery card would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
